dmca.title: Speedticketbeaters races after copycat website
dmca.body:
The website ihatespeedingtickets.com has been using my copyrighted material for approximately 1 year. I wrote the material for my site speedticketbeaters.com, and published it on line through Go Daddy well before ihatespeedingtickets.com even existed. On a side note, I have observed that ihatespeedingtickets.com is also using the written material of several other speed ticket related websites. I have attempted through my attorney to contact ihatespeedingtickets.com with a Cease and Desist letter to which they do not respond. Nor did they respond to Go Daddy's inquiry on the matter.

The copyrighted work appears on the following pages:

Much of the written content is from my site on http://www.ihatespeedingtickets.com/about-beating-a-speeding-ticket.shtml

The testimonials listed are from MY site and are on http://www.ihatespeedingtickcts.com/test-beating-a-speeding-ticket.shtml

There are possibly other places within ihatespeedingtickets.com using my sites content. I may be contacted at [private]@allmail.net
 Ihatespeedingtickets.com may be contacted at [private]@gmail.com

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private]/Owner Speedticketbeaters.com
